resources.string: Basically the application is a digital curriculum that will show my professional and personal information such as skills, occupations, contact, training etc... Anyway, I hope you like it.

My name is Rafael, I am a student at UNICAP and I consider myself a very sociable person when you get to know myself better, I have been fascinated with technology and computers since my childhood, and using the computer for games is one of my hobbies.
I am currently unemployed, but studying at the Catholic University of Pernambuco and aspiring to be a developer of artificial intelligence.
On this page are most of my skills that I acquired during my training, experiences, skills and other knowledge.

- Agile Methodologies 
- Web Development 
- Microsoft Office 
- Database
School education: Complete at Damas High School
